Name: Base Station, Queens Lincoln Car & Limo Serv., Queens
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Queens Lincoln Car & Limo Service Inc. also known as Queens Lincoln Car & Limo Serv. and also known as Queens Lincoln Car & Limo Service, Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Queens.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Queens Lincoln Car & Limo Service Inc. also known as Queens Lincoln Car & Limo Serv. and also known as Queens Lincoln Car & Limo Service, Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 35-30 Farrington Street in the borough of Queens is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#2005
7/14/1999
